## useLayoutContext (hook)

Ensures that a layout context is provided via context. If no layout context is provided, an error is thrown.

### Import

```typescript
import { useLayoutContext } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

{% usage name="uselayoutcontext" package="@livekit/components-react" exampleCount=0 /%}

**Returns:**

[LayoutContextType](./react//components-react.layoutcontexttype.md)
